Detailed Description

2nd order Butterworth lowpass filter; Butterworth filters have maximum flat frequency response in the pass band. Based on an algorithm from Dodge & Jerse (1997): Computer Music - Synthesis, Composition, and Performance. 2nd edition. Schirmer.
